meanings.definition: The state or quality of being prepotent.
meanings.sent1: The prepotencies of the king were evident in his ability to make decisions for the kingdom.
meanings.sent2: The prepotencies of the team captain were respected by all the players.
meanings.sent3: The prepotencies of the boss made everyone follow his lead without question.
meanings.sent4: Her prepotencies in the classroom made her the most influential student among her peers.
meanings.sent5: The prepotencies of the sun in the sky were undeniable as it shone brightly over the land.

meanings.definition: The power or influence of prepotent individuals or factors.
meanings.sent1: The prepotencies of the wealthy family allowed them to have a significant impact on local politics.
meanings.sent2: The prepotencies of the CEO were felt throughout the entire company.
meanings.sent3: The prepotencies of the magician's tricks amazed the audience.
meanings.sent4: The prepotencies of nature could be seen in the mighty force of the waterfall.
meanings.sent5: The prepotencies of the superhero's abilities saved the city from disaster.
